namespace.title: The URL of the repository with your application source code.

ruby_version.description: Version of Ruby image to be used (3.0-ubi8 by default).

memory_limit.title: Maximum amount of memory the container can use.

context_dir.description: Set this to the relative path to your project if it is not in the root of your repository.

application_domain.description: The exposed hostname that will route to the httpd service, if left blank a value will be defaulted.

github_webhook_secret.description: Github trigger secret.  A difficult to guess string encoded as part of the webhook URL.  Not encrypted.

secret_key_base.description: Your secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

rails_env.description: Environment under which the sample application will run. Could be set to production, development or test.
